format.title: Writing Format
format.subtitle: Choose the format that best fits your writing style

descriptions.standard: Standard posts are written in continuous paragraphs, ideal for longer narratives and reflections.
descriptions.formatted: Formatted posts use lists, line breaks, and clear structure to make reading easier.
descriptions.short: Short posts are direct and objective, perfect for quick and impactful messages.
descriptions.emojis: Posts with emojis add personality and make content more visual and engaging.
descriptions.default: Choose the format that best fits your writing style. This will be the default for your LinkedIn posts.

examples.standard:
Today I want to share an important reflection on product design.

In recent months, I've been working on challenging projects that taught me a valuable lesson: simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

When we start designing, it's tempting to add features and details. But the best products are those that solve complex problems simply.

What do you think? How do you apply this principle in your work?
examples.formatted:
Today I want to share 3 important lessons about product design:

â†’ Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication
â†’ Fewer features, more value
â†’ Focus on the problem, not the solution

In recent months, I learned that the best products solve complex problems simply.

Which of these lessons resonates most with you?
examples.short:
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

In recent months I learned that the best products solve complex problems simply.

Less is more.

upload.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Please choose files smaller than 10MB each.
upload.unsupportedType: File type not supported. Please upload documents, images, audio files, or videos.
upload.authentication: Session expired. Please refresh the page and try again.
upload.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
upload.storage: Storage limit reached. Please delete some files and try again.
upload.duplicate: A file with this name already exists. Please rename the file and try again.
upload.default: Upload failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem continues.

link.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid website URL (e.g., example.com or https://example.com).
link.notAccessible: Website is not accessible. Please check the URL and try again.
link.timeout: Website took too long to respond. Please try again later.
link.duplicate: This link has already been added to your knowledge base.
link.default: Failed to add link. Please check the URL and try again.

delete.notFound: File no longer exists. It may have already been deleted.
delete.permission: You do not have permission to delete this file.
delete.inUse: File is currently being used and cannot be deleted. Please try again later.
delete.default: Failed to delete file. Please try again or contact support.
